sense.def:
Kadar stavkajoči delavci
picket a place of work
, stojijo pred prostorom, kjer sicer delajo, da bi prepričali še druge delavce, naj se pridružijo stavki.

seg.quote: The plan was to picket docks and power stations.
...the historic picket at Saltley coke depot.

sense.def:
Pickets
so ljudje, ki stavkajo tam, kjer sicer delajo.

seg.quote: We could hear the chanting of the pickets.
